trends: There have been no other sightings in Sonora
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsTwo friends of mine wanted me to report a sighting they had on June 20th. They were outdoors when they both noticed a very bright light hovering in the sky over Sonora TX, It was stationary for a short while then took off with a very high rate of speed. They said they were amazed at how bright it was and how it made no sound whatsoever. They both noted that nothing they knew of could travel that fast. This happened at or around 12:30 am.
Summary: Very , Very Bright light that hovered then took off at super high rate of speed
